Verify renderbuffers are initialized to 0 before being read in WebGL

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".

PASS internal buffers have been initialized to 0
PASS getError was expected value: NO_ERROR : should be no error after renderbufferStorage(internalformat = RGBA4).
PASS user buffers have been initialized to 0

PASS internal buffers have been initialized to 0
PASS getError was expected value: NO_ERROR : should be no error after renderbufferStorage(internalformat = RGBA4).
PASS user buffers have been initialized to 0

PASS internal buffers have been initialized to 0
PASS getError was expected value: NO_ERROR : should be no error after renderbufferStorage(internalformat = RGBA4).
PASS user buffers have been initialized to 0

PASS internal buffers have been initialized to 0
PASS getError was expected value: NO_ERROR : should be no error after renderbufferStorage(internalformat = RGBA4).
PASS user buffers have been initialized to 0

PASS clearColor is [0, 1, 0, 1]
PASS getError was expected value: NO_ERROR : should be no errors
PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
